price: He created the heavens and earth for a true purpose, He shaped you and perfected your form. And to Him is the final return.
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمۡ فَأَحۡسَنَ صُوَرَكُمۡۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
